synonyms: māyā-śaktye—by His external potency; brahmāṇḍa-ādi—of material universes and so on; paripāṭī—an orderly arrangement; sṛjana—creating; urukrama-śabdera—of the word urukrama; ei—this; artha—of the meaning; nirūpaṇa—ascertainment.
translation: "The word urukrama indicates the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who, by His external potency, has perfectly created innumerable universes.
